summary: 48 new spells unlockable through perk progress
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]Adds Zodiac Achievements In Form Of Perks To Existing Skill Trees.Does not affect or change vanilla perk trees it is just an attachment of single perk (check out pics). every Perk Gives You new spells and abilities.You must be level 70 of the skill to unlock its Zodiac perk.Total Of [i]48 new spells[/i].All spells are Apprentice level (lvl 50),with [i]9 new abilities and 3 new[/i] [i]powers[/i].All new abilities should be displayed in Active Effects Page,with every chachteristic individualy.
With completion of all 12 zodiac perks opent the Ability :
[i]Agent Of Julianos -[/i] one per day be 100% resistant to magic,50% faster magicka regenration and chameleon 50 %
[/size]
[size=4]Also unlock crafting recipes with each perk.[/size]
[i]Zodiac Craftables :[/i][size=4] With every perk unlock new craftables.Check the list below.[/size]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffffff][size=5][u][b]Zodiac Magic :[/b][/u][/size][/color][/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#000000][size=5][b]IllusionS.T  : Saggitarrius[/b][/size][/color][/font]
[size=4][i]New Spells : [/i][/size]
[size=4]1.[/size][size=3][b][i]Subterfurge[/i][/b]-[/size][size=4] Muffle Your Movement And Shade Your Appereance 60sec[/size]
[size=4]2.[/size][b][i][size=3]Hack-[/size][/i][/b][size=4] Command An Greater Dwarven Automaton[/size]
[size=4]3.[/size][b][i][size=3]Accelerate-[/size][/i][/b][size=4] Increase Your Movement Speed By Three Times for 60sec[/size]
[size=4]4.[/size][size=3][b][i]SummonDremora [/i][/b][b][i]Kynreeve(Warlock)[/i][/b] [/size]
[size=4][i]And New Ability - [/i][/size]
[b][i][size=3]Precisioun[/size][/i][/b][size=4]-which fortifies your archer skill by 100 pts.  [/size]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#000000][size=5][b]One HandedS.T : Aries[/b][/size][/color][/font]
[size=4][i]New Spells :[/i][/size]
[size=4]1. [/size][b][i][size=3]Material Fury[/size]- [/i][/b][size=4]Increased Weapon Attack Speed 300% For 30sec.[/size]
[size=4]2. [/size][b][i][size=3]Morgana Effect -[/size][/i][/b][size=4]Sets Entire Area On Fire,Infflicting 270 pts of fire damage to all nearby living beings.[/size]
[size=4]3. [/size][b][i][size=3]HardenedCore -[/size][/i][/b][size=4]Increased armor rating by 100 and 30% greater damage done with crossbow.[/size]
[size=4]4. [/size][b][i]I[size=3]nffect  -[/size][/i][/b][size=4] Poison  And Paralayze Human Enemy For 15 Sec. [/size]
[size=4][i]And new ability [/i][/size]
[size=3][b][i]Monopolist[/i][/b] -[/size][size=4]  Which allows you to craft five ingots from one ore (excluding dwarven) [/size]

[size=4] [/size][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#000000][size=5][b] RestorationS.T : Aquarius[/b][/size][/color][/font][i]
[size=4]New Spells :[/size][/i]
[size=4]1.  [/size][size=3][b][i]Reflect Soul I[/i][/b] [/size][size=4]– Absorb Targets Magicka by 70 pts[/size]
[b][i]2.    [/i][/b][b][i][size=3]Cure Disease[/size]
[/i][/b][b][i]3.    [/i][/b][b][i][size=3]Dilute – [/size][/i][/b][size=4]Turn Silver Ore Into 3 Quicksilver Ingots[/size]
[b][i]4.    [/i][/b][b][i][size=3]Stability –[/size] [/i][/b][size=4]You do not stagger for 120sec[/size]
[size=4][i]And new ability :[/i][/size]
[b][i][size=3]Aquatic Orientation[/size][/i][/b][size=4] which increases your magicka by 100pts and your magicka regeneration by 25%.[/size]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#000000][size=5][b]ConjurationS.T : Leo[/b][/size][/color][/font]
[size=4][i]New Spells : [/i][/size]
[b][i]1.    [/i][/b][b][i][size=3]Summon Flame Triad – [/size][/i][/b][size=4]Summons Three Flame Attronachs[/size]
[b][i]2.     [/i][/b][b][i][size=3]Summon Ice Sisters –[/size][/i][/b][size=4] Summons Two Ice Wraiths[/size]
[b][i]3.   [size=3] [/size][/i][/b][b][i][size=3]Demoralize –[/size] [/i][/b][size=4]Silence on target for 30 sec[/size]
[b][i]4.    [/i][/b][size=3][b][i]Recharge[/i][/b] [/size][size=4]– Regenerate Magicka From Thin Air[/size]
[size=4][i]New Ability : [/i][/size]
[b][i][size=3]PyromanticPotential [/size]–[/i][/b][size=4] 50% ressistance to fire and ice,and fire spells have longer duration and bigger range.[/size]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#000000][size=5][b]
Smithing S.T: Scorpio
[/b][/size][/color][/font]
[size=4][i]New Spells : [/i][/size]
[size=4]1.     [/size][b][i][size=3]Aspect Of Knight –[/size][/i][/b][size=4] Increased Health By 80pts,Health Reg. By 120%,Magicka by 70pts and Stamina Reg. By 130% for 30sec.[/size]
[size=4]2.    [/size][size=3] [b][i]Dominate –[/i][/b] [/size][size=4]Disarm And Dismay Lesser Foe[/size]
[size=4]3.     [/size][b][i][size=3]Dominate II –[/size][/i][/b][size=4] Disarm And Dismay Greater Foe[/size]
[size=4]4.    [/size][size=3] [b][i]Purity –[/i][/b] [/size][size=4]Cure Disease And Restore Health By 250pts[/size]
[size=4][i]New Ability : [/i][/size]
[b][i][size=3]Vralla Outbreak[/size][/i][/b][size=4] -Conjure Strong Chaurus Hunter,Inffected with Vralla and spread Vralla locally,while the same chaurus is allied with you.[/size]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#000000][size=5][b]Two HandedS.T : Pisces[/b][/size][/color][/font][i]
[size=4]New Spells : [/size][/i]
[b][i]1.     [/i][/b][b][i][size=3]Transition –[/size] [/i][/b][size=4]Exchange 250 pts of stamina for 1000 pts of magicka.Fortified magicka by 500 pts for 50 sec.[/size]
[b][i]2.    [/i][/b][b][i][size=3]Firewall [/size]–[/i][/b][size=4] Fire ressistance 100 %  for 30 sec.[/size]
[b][i]3.     [/i][/b][b][i][size=3]Summon Dremora Markynaz (Archer)[/size]
[/i][/b][b][i]4.     [/i][/b][b][i][size=3]Revenge Of Dibella [/size]- [/i][/b][size=4]Absorb Health 25 pts per sec. And Poison The Target 5 pts Per sec.[/size]
[size=4][i]New Ability :[/i][/size]
[b][i][size=3]Eclipse –[/size] [/i][/b][size=4]shroud the sun in darkness [/size]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#000000][size=5][b]Sneak S.T :Libra[/b][/size][/color][/font][i]
[size=4]New Spells : [/size][/i]
[size=4]1.    [/size][b][i][size=3]Stimulate Self [/size]–[/i][/b][size=4] 100% magic resistance for 30 sec.[/size]
[size=4]2.    [/size][b][i][size=3]Heart Attack [/size]–[/i][/b][size=4] Damage Targets Health By 250 pts[/size]
[size=4]3.    [/size][b][i][size=3]Reflect Soul II [/size]–[/i][/b][size=4] Absorb Target's Magicka By  750pts[/size]
[size=4]4.  [/size][size=3]  [/size][b][i][size=3]Sabotage [/size]–[/i][/b][size=4] Disarm Greater Foe[/size]
[size=4][i]New Ability :[/i][/size]
[b][i][size=3]Dragon Blood Immune System [/size][/i][/b][size=4]– 70 % resistance to disease and total poison resistance.You stagger 25% less and Health Reg. Increased by 10%.[/size]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#000000][size=5][b]Marksman S.T: Taurus[/b][/size][/color][/font]
[size=4][i]New Spells : [/i][/size]
[b][i]1.     [/i][/b][size=3][b][i]Stimulate[/i][/b] [b][i]Other[/i][/b]–[/size][size=4] Gives 100 % magic resistance to nearby allies for 30sec[/size]
[size=4].[/size][b][i]2.     [/i][/b][b][i][size=3]Linguist I [/size][/i][/b][size=4]– Time between shouts is totaly reduced for 5 min.[/size]
[b][i]3.     [/i][/b][b][i][size=3]Corrode [/size][/i][/b][size=4]– damage dwarven automaton health by 7 pts for 45 sec.[/size]
[b][i]4.     [/i][/b][b][i][size=3]Spell Of Taproot[/size] [/i][/b][size=4]– Cures Poison And Restores All Stamina.[/size]
[size=4][i]New Ability : [/i][/size]
[b][i][size=3]Liquidate [/size]–[/i][/b][size=4] Kill lesser foe once per day[/size]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#000000][size=5][b]SpeechraftS.T : Virgo[/b][/size][/color][/font]
[size=4][i]New Spells : [/i][/size]
[b][i]1.     [/i][/b][b][i][size=3]Berserk [/size]-[/i][/b][size=4] For 30sec.Fortified Stamina By 100pts,StaminaReg. by 200%and Health Is Fully Recovered[/size]
[b][i]2.    [/i][/b][size=3][b][i]Summon Potema's Advisor[/i][/b] [/size][size=4]– Summon An Draugr Overlord Armed With Dragonbone longsword[/size]
[b][i]3.     [/i][/b][b][i][size=3]Linguist II [/size][/i][/b][size=4]– Pacify Any Human[/size]
[b][i]4.     [/i][/b][b][i][size=3]Summon Dwarven Sentinel[/size]- [/i][/b][size=4]Summon Dwarven Outfited Spirit Soldier[/size]
[i][size=4]New Ability [/size][b]:[/b][/i][b][i]
[/i][/b][size=3][b][i]Agent Of Nine[/i][/b] - Stamina Increased by 70 pts,Carry Qapacity by 100 pts and Magicka by 30 pts and Health Reg. By 10% 
[/size]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#000000][size=5][b]Heavy ArmorS.T : Capricorn[/b][/size][/color][/font]
[size=4][i]New Spells : [/i][/size]
[b][i]1.     [/i][/b][b][i][size=3]Trance –[/size][/i][/b][size=4] Damage Stamina By 1000pts and stagger the foe[/size]
[size=4].[/size][b][i]2.    [/i][/b][b][i][size=3]Greater Flames –[/size][/i][/b][size=4] Fire damage of 50 pts per sec.[/size]
[b][i]3.     [/i][/b][b][i][size=3]Extraterrestrial Invasion[/size] –[/i][/b][size=4]Summon three Reaper Chaurus[/size]
[b][i]4.     [/i][/b][b][i][size=3]Summon Forsaken Pack [/size][/i][/b][size=4]– Summon three spectral wolves [/size]
[size=4][i]New Ability : [/i][/size]
[b][i][size=3]Aspect Of Harvest [/size]–[/i][/b][size=4]Armed With Two Handed Weapon You Do Not Stagger [/size]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#000000][size=5][b]DestructionS.T : Gemini[/b][/size][/color][/font][i]
[size=4]New Spells : [/size][/i]
[b][i]1.     [/i][/b][b][i][size=3]Summon Nighitngale Archer [/size]–[/i][/b][size=4] Summons An Spectral Archer Nightingale[/size]
[b][i]2.     [/i][/b][b][i][size=3]Summon Nightingale Fighter [/size]–[/i][/b][size=4] Summons An Spectral Nightingale Armed With Sword[/size]
[b][i]3.     [/i][/b][b][i][size=3]Dilated Perception[/size] –[/i][/b][size=4] Night Eye[/size]
[b][i]4.     [/i][/b][b][i][size=3]Fencing [/size]–[/i][/b][size=4] Increased Health By 50 pts and health reg by 150% and one handed attacks by 100 pts[/size]
[i][size=4]New Ability [/size][b]:[/b][/i][b][i]
[/i][/b][b][i][size=3]Trinity Fields[/size] -[/i][/b][size=4]you can summon up to three[/size]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#000000][size=5][b]Light Armor S.T: Cancer[/b][/size][/color][/font]
[size=4][i]New Spells : [/i][/size]
[b][i]1.     [/i][/b][b][i][size=3]Logic Bomb [/size]– [/i][/b][size=4]A fireball that does 100 pts of health damage and reduces health reg. By 100 % for 60 sec[/size]
[b][i]2.    [/i][/b][b][i][size=3]Summon spectral Valkyrie [/size]– [/i][/b][size=4]summons an spectral Valkyrie which is like an decoy because she can not fight[/size]
[b][i]3.    [/i][/b][b][i][size=3]Conceal [/size]–[/i][/b][size=4] Increased speed twice and invisibility for 45 sec[/size]
[b][i]4.    [/i][/b][b][i][size=3]The False Mirror[/size][/i][/b][size=4] – Reflect 100% damage for 30 sec. [/size]
[size=4][i]New Ability : [/i][/size]
[b][i][size=3]Hyper Production [/size][/i][/b][size=4]– Create 5 potions from one recipe ingridients  


[/size]


[center][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffffff][size=5][b][u] Zodiac Craftables V 2.0:
[/u][/b][/size][/color][/font][/center][size=4][b]Saggitarrius : [/b]
[i][u]Saggitarrius Bow[/u][/i], Delivers fatal shots.But enchant cost is enormous.Huge spectral bow. (unique textures)

[b]Aries :[/b]
[i][u]Ice Razor and Frost Screamer  [/u][/i]axes.With Ice enchant. Stalhrim and dragonbone textures.

[b]Aqarius :[/b]
[i][u]Aquatic Thorn[/u][/i] - An Dagger with silence effect. (unique textrues)

[b]Leo :[/b]
[i][u]Embrace Of Leo[/u][/i] - An shield with chameleon effect (unique textures)

[b]Scorpio :[/b]
[i][u]TailOf Scorpion[/u][/i]– Katana with silence effect. (unique textures)

[b]Pisces : [/b]
[i][u]Mask Of Sorrow – [/u][/i]an mask which grants 30 % resist frost, 50pts. Increased restoration,and waterbreathing. (unique textures)

[b]Taurus : [/b]
[i][u]Tau Thorn - [/u][/i] An Dagger with chance of instant kill.     (unique textures)

[b]Libra : [/b]
[i][u]Diplomatic Staff – [/u][/i]Battle staff which causes burden effect . (unique textures)

[b]Virgo [/b][i][u][b]:[/b]
[/u][/i][i][u]Cynide Thorn[/u][/i] – An Dagger with drain health effect of 2 pts for 24 hours

[b]Capricorn :[/b]
[i][u]Capricious Thorn[/u][/i]- An Dagger with drain stamina effect for2 hours.

[b]Gemini :[/b]
[i][u]Ebony Rose Ring - [/u][/i] An ring with enchantment of inffilict 25% more damage toFalmer,Orcs,Vampires and  grants posion resistance of 100%. (Unique textures)

[b]Cancer : [/b]
[i][u]SpitterCobra Deviation Bow [/u][/i], fires three times higher distance,has fires five times faster thatordinary bow. (glass bow). But replaces the glass bow with unique textures.
Check pics.


[b]P.S[/b]   Probably the ability [b][i][u]Trinity Fields[/u][/i][/b] will be prematurely activated since it is used outside of Gemini perk,so do not be suprised if you find youself summoning up to three without Gemini perk.
Also the Saggitarius bow is partially invisible in inventory and crafting menu.
